# The `SCEVExpanderCleaner` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Helper to remove instructions inserted during <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> expansion, unless they are marked as used. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::SCEVExpanderCleaner</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Helper to remove instructions inserted during <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> expansion, unless they are marked as used.

### ResultUsed {#af628ea33a04a2682ea00511b770ee868}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::SCEVExpanderCleaner::ResultUsed">
Indicates whether the result of the expansion is used.

If false, the instructions added during expansion are removed.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/scalarevolutionexpander-h/#l00553">553</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/scalarevolutionexpander-h">ScalarEvolutionExpander.h</a>.
